description:
With this DLC you will unlock:

- marble painting 
- snowman accessory
- reindeer accessory
- reindeer accessory second version 
- christmas tree accessory
- reindeer stencil
- snowflakes stencil
- snowflake stencil
- sweater stencil
- christmas tree stencil

Mix different colors, create interesting nail polish designs and use your new Christmas-themed accessories or stencils!
name: Acrylic Nails!: Winter Marble
